description: Deploy a vibe-coded single-page app instantly — paste your HTML, and it’s hosted automatically in IBM Cloud Object Storage. No servers, no stress.

documentation.instructions: Paste your Vibe Coder HTML in the 'Vibe Code' field below and click Deploy. The app will automatically create an IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket, upload your HTML as `index.html`, and host it securely.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: IBM Cloud API Key
inputs.description: Used to authenticate with IBM Cloud. Don't worry — it stays private.

ui_hints.placeholder: Enter your IBM Cloud API key

inputs.name: cos_name
inputs.label: COS Instance Name
inputs.description: Name for your new IBM Cloud Object Storage instance and bucket.

inputs.name: vibe_html
inputs.label: Vibe Code
inputs.description: Paste your HTML code here — this will become your app’s index.html.

outputs.name: cos_bucket_name
outputs.label: Deployed Bucket
outputs.description: Your vibe-coded app was deployed to this COS bucket.
